name: A Hero's Quest
description:
My name is Zack Lim. I am a game art student studying at media Design school. A Hero’s Quest is my very first game project i’ve worked on. Making my own game was not actually something i think i could of ever done. I do illustration and concept art,i love to draw and design then actually make games. So making this game was more of a challenge to me. 

A Hero’s Quest is a hack and slash side scrolling platform game.There is a few different levels each with their own challenges,  different monsters will gets in your way you must fight and slay them and find the way to progress to the next level. The Art style is simplistic with strong bright colours, having an anime cartoon design to the characters and creatures. 

Release Date:

24/06/2014

Platform:

PC

Price:

Free to play
